alert.note: Alert for Clark; Comanche; Ford; Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Ford, east central Meade, northwestern Comanche and central Clark Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Acres, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Acres around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ashland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
